name: Broken Skies (TheGuyInYourGame)
description:
Short:

A game where you flip gravity, shoot and fight bosses in outer space.  A simple little prototype i made for a school assignment.

Story:

As the only robot not taken over by the AI Robot Colonist Leader you enter what seems to be the the center of all the trouble. You fight your way trough the remains of a space structure to defeat the bad link and once again restore peace in electronics.
